atk-s0501a1:2_0: Idāni yaṁ vuttaṁ ‘‘buddhaṁ saraṇagamanaṁ, gamakañca vibhāvaye’’ti,
atk-s0501a1:2_2: paññattito sabbaññutaññāṇapadaṭṭhānaṁ vā saccābhisambodhimupādāya paññattito sattaviseso buddho. Yathāha –
atk-s0501a1:3_0: ‘‘Buddhoti yo so bhagavā sayambhū anācariyako pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu sāmaṁ saccāni abhisambujjhi, tattha ca sabbaññutaṁ patto,
atk-s0501a1:5_1: bodhetāti buddho’’ti evamādinā nayena veditabbo. Vuttañcetaṁ –
atk-s0501a1:6_0: ‘‘Buddhoti kenaṭṭhena buddho? Bujjhitā saccānīti buddho, bodhetā pajāyāti buddho, sabbaññutāya buddho, sabbadassāvitāya buddho, anaññaneyyatāya buddho, vikasitāya buddho, khīṇāsavasaṅkhātena buddho,
atk-s0501a1:6_1: nirupakkilesasaṅkhātena buddho, ekantavītarāgoti buddho, ekantavītadosoti buddho, ekantavītamohoti buddho, ekantanikkilesoti buddho, ekāyanamaggaṁ gatoti buddho,
atk-s0501a1:6_4: Buddhoti netaṁ nāmaṁ mātarā kataṁ, na pitarā kataṁ, na bhātarā kataṁ, na bhaginiyā kataṁ, na mittāmaccehi kataṁ, na ñātisālohitehi kataṁ, na samaṇabrāhmaṇehi kataṁ, na devatāhi kataṁ,
atk-s0501a1:6_5: vimokkhantikametaṁ buddhānaṁ bhagavantānaṁ bodhiyā mūle saha sabbaññutaññāṇassa paṭilābhā sacchikā paññatti yadidaṁ buddho’’ti (mahāni. 192; cūḷani.
atk-s0501a1:7_0: Ettha ca yathā loke avagantā avagatoti vuccati,
atk-s0501a1:7_2: Yathā paṇṇasosā vātā paṇṇasusāti vuccanti, evaṁ bodhetā pajāyāti buddho.
atk-s0501a1:7_3: Sabbaññutāya buddhoti sabbadhammabujjhanasamatthāya buddhiyā buddhoti vuttaṁ hoti.
atk-s0501a1:7_4: Sabbadassāvitāya buddhoti sabbadhammabodhanasamatthāya buddhiyā buddhoti vuttaṁ hoti.
atk-s0501a1:7_5: Anaññaneyyatāya buddhoti aññena abodhito sayameva buddhattā buddhoti vuttaṁ hoti.
atk-s0501a1:7_6: Vikasitāya buddhoti nānāguṇavikasanato padumamiva vikasanaṭṭhena buddhoti vuttaṁ hoti.
atk-s0501a1:7_7: Khīṇāsavasaṅkhātena buddhoti evamādīhi cittasaṅkocakaradhammapahānato niddākkhayavibuddho puriso viya sabbakilesaniddākkhayavibuddhattā buddhoti vuttaṁ hoti.
atk-s0501a1:7_8: Ekāyanamaggaṁ gatoti buddhoti buddhiyatthānaṁ gamanatthapariyāyato yathā maggaṁ gatopi puriso gatoti vuccati,
atk-s0501a1:7_9: evaṁ ekāyanamaggaṁ gatattāpi buddhoti vuccatīti dassetuṁ vuttaṁ.
atk-s0501a1:7_10: Eko anuttaraṁ sammāsambodhiṁ abhisambuddhoti buddhoti na parehi buddhattā buddho,
atk-s0501a1:7_11: kintu sayameva anuttaraṁ sammāsambodhiṁ abhisambuddhattā buddhoti vuttaṁ hoti .
atk-s0501a1:7_12: Abuddhivihatattā buddhipaṭilābhā buddhoti buddhi buddhaṁ bodhoti pariyāyavacanametaṁ.
atk-s0501a1:7_13: Tattha yathā nīlarattaguṇayogato ‘‘nīlo paṭo, ratto paṭo’’ti vuccati,
atk-s0501a1:7_14: evaṁ buddhiguṇayogato buddhoti ñāpetuṁ vuttaṁ hoti.
atk-s0501a1:7_15: Tato paraṁ buddhoti netaṁ nāmanti evamādi atthamanugatā ayaṁ paññattīti bodhanatthaṁ vuttanti evarūpena nayena sabbesaṁ padānaṁ buddhasaddassa sādhanasamattho attho veditabbo.
atk-s0501a1:10_1: saraṇagatānaṁ teneva saraṇagamanena bhayaṁ santāsaṁ dukkhaṁ duggatiṁ parikkilesaṁ hiṁsati vidhamati nīharati nirodhetīti attho.
atk-s0501a1:10_2: Atha vā hite pavattanena ahitā ca nivattanena sattānaṁ bhayaṁ hiṁsatīti buddho,
atk-s0501a1:10_5: Tasmā imināpi pariyāyena taṁ ratanattayaṁ saraṇaṁ.
atk-s0501a1:10_6: Tappasādataggarutāhi vihataviddhaṁsitakileso tapparāyaṇatākārappavatto aparappaccayo vā cittuppādo saraṇagamanaṁ.
atk-s0501a1:10_9: esa me parāyaṇa’’nti evametaṁ upetīti attho . Upento ca ‘‘ete mayaṁ, bhante,
atk-s0501a1:10_11: upāsake no bhagavā dhāretū’’ti tapussabhallikādayo viya samādānena vā, ‘‘satthā me, bhante, bhagavā, sāvakohamasmī’’ti (saṁ. ni.
atk-s0501a1:10_13: ‘‘evaṁ vutte brahmāyu brāhmaṇo uṭṭhāyāsanā ekaṁsaṁ uttarāsaṅgaṁ karitvā yena bhagavā tenañjaliṁ paṇāmetvā tikkhattuṁ udānaṁ udānesi ‘namo tassa bhagavato arahato sammāsambuddhassa.
atk-s0501a1:10_17: ariyapuggalā viya saraṇagamanupakkilesasamucchedena vāti anekappakāraṁ visayato kiccato ca upeti.
atk-s0501a1:13_1: gamanīyañca dīpaye’’ti vuttānaṁ bhedādīnaṁ ayaṁ dīpanā,
atk-s0501a1:13_2: evaṁ saraṇagatassa puggalassa duvidho saraṇagamanabhedo – sāvajjo ca anavajjo ca. Anavajjo kālakiriyāya,
atk-s0501a1:13_6: Buddhaguṇesu aññāṇasaṁsayamicchāñāṇappavattiyā anādarādippavattiyā ca tesaṁ saraṇaṁ saṁkiliṭṭhaṁ hoti.
atk-s0501a1:13_7: Ariyapuggalā pana abhinnasaraṇā ceva asaṁkiliṭṭhasaraṇā ca honti. Yathāha ‘‘aṭṭhānametaṁ, bhikkhave, anavakāso,
atk-s0501a1:13_8: yaṁ diṭṭhisampanno puggalo aññaṁ satthāraṁ uddiseyyā’’ti (a. ni. 1.276; ma. ni. 3.128; vibha. 809).
atk-s0501a1:13_9: Puthujjanā tu yāvadeva saraṇabhedaṁ na pāpuṇanti, tāvadeva abhinnasaraṇā. Sāvajjova nesaṁ saraṇabhedo,
atk-s0501a1:13_10: saṁkileso ca aniṭṭhaphalado hoti. Anavajjo avipākattā aphalo,
atk-s0501a1:13_11: abhedo pana phalato iṭṭhameva phalaṁ deti.
atk-s0501a1:15_0: ‘‘Yekeci buddhaṁ saraṇaṁ gatāse, na te gamissanti apāyabhūmiṁ;
atk-s0501a1:16_0: Pahāya mānusaṁ dehaṁ, devakāyaṁ paripūressantī’’ti. (dī. ni. 2.332; saṁ. ni. 1.37);
atk-s0501a1:17_0: Tatra ca ye saraṇagamanupakkilesasamucchedena saraṇaṁ gatā, te apāyaṁ na gamissanti.
atk-s0501a1:17_1: Itare pana saraṇagamanena na gamissantīti evaṁ gāthāya adhippāyo veditabbo.
atk-s0501a1:20_0: Gamanīyadīpanāyaṁ codako āha – ‘‘buddhaṁ saraṇaṁ gacchāmī’’ti ettha yo buddhaṁ saraṇaṁ gacchati,
atk-s0501a1:20_1: esa buddhaṁ vā gaccheyya saraṇaṁ vā,
atk-s0501a1:20_2: ubhayathāpi ca ekassa vacanaṁ niratthakaṁ. Kasmā?
atk-s0501a1:20_4: Na hettha ‘‘ajaṁ gāmaṁ netī’’tiādīsu viya dvikammakattaṁ akkharacintakā icchanti.
atk-s0501a1:21_1: gacchati pacchimaṁ disa’’ntiādīsu (saṁ. ni. 1.159; 3.87) viya sātthakamevāti ce? Na,
atk-s0501a1:21_3: Etesañhi samānādhikaraṇabhāve adhippete paṭihatacittopi buddhaṁ upasaṅkamanto buddhaṁ saraṇaṁ gato siyā.
atk-s0501a1:21_4: Yañhi taṁ buddhoti visesitaṁ saraṇaṁ, tamevesa gatoti. ‘‘Etaṁ kho saraṇaṁ khemaṁ, etaṁ saraṇamuttama’’nti (dha. pa.
atk-s0501a1:21_5: 192) vacanato samānādhikaraṇattamevāti ce? Na, tattheva tabbhāvato.
atk-s0501a1:21_6: Tattheva hi gāthāpade etaṁ buddhādiratanattayaṁ saraṇagatānaṁ bhayaharaṇattasaṅkhāte saraṇabhāve abyabhicaraṇato ‘‘khemamuttamañca saraṇa’’nti ayaṁ samānādhikaraṇabhāvo adhippeto,
atk-s0501a1:21_7: aññattha tu gamisambandhe sati saraṇagamanassa appasiddhito anadhippetoti asādhakametaṁ. ‘‘Etaṁ saraṇamāgamma,
atk-s0501a1:21_8: sabbadukkhā pamuccatī’’ti ettha gamisambandhepi saraṇagamanapasiddhito samānādhikaraṇattamevāti ce? Na pubbe vuttadosappasaṅgato.
atk-s0501a1:21_9: Tatrāpi hi samānādhikaraṇabhāve sati etaṁ buddhadhammasaṅghasaraṇaṁ paṭihatacittopi āgamma sabbadukkhā pamucceyyāti evaṁ pubbe vuttadosappasaṅgo eva siyā,
atk-s0501a1:21_10: na ca no dosena atthi atthoti asādhakametaṁ. Yathā ‘‘mamañhi, ānanda,
atk-s0501a1:21_11: kalyāṇamittaṁ āgamma jātidhammā sattā jātiyā parimuccantī’’ti (saṁ. ni.
atk-s0501a1:21_12: 1.129) ettha bhagavato kalyāṇamittassa ānubhāvena parimuccamānā sattā ‘‘kalyāṇamittaṁ āgamma parimuccantī’’ti vuttā.
atk-s0501a1:21_14: sabbadukkhā pamuccatī’’ti vuttoti evamettha adhippāyo veditabbo.
atk-s0501a1:22_0: Evaṁ sabbathāpi na buddhassa gamanīyattaṁ yujjati, na saraṇassa, na ubhayesaṁ,
atk-s0501a1:22_1: icchitabbañca gacchāmīti niddiṭṭhassa gamakassa gamanīyaṁ, tato vattabbā ettha yuttīti. Vuccate –
atk-s0501a1:23_1: gamanākāradassanatthaṁ tu taṁ saraṇavacanaṁ, buddhaṁ saraṇanti gacchāmi. Esa me saraṇaṁ, esa me parāyaṇaṁ, aghassa, tātā,
atk-s0501a1:23_2: hitassa ca vidhātāti iminā adhippāyena etaṁ gacchāmi bhajāmi sevāmi payirupāsāmi, evaṁ vā jānāmi bujjhāmīti.
atk-s0501a1:23_3: Yesañhi dhātūnaṁ gatiattho buddhipi tesaṁ atthoti.
atk-s0501a1:23_4: Iti-saddassa appayogā ayuttamiti ce? Taṁ na.
atk-s0501a1:23_5: Tattha siyā – yadi cettha evamattho bhaveyya,
atk-s0501a1:23_6: tato ‘‘aniccaṁ rūpaṁ aniccaṁ rūpanti yathābhūtaṁ pajānātī’’ti evamādīsu (saṁ. ni. 3.55,
atk-s0501a1:23_7: 85) viya iti-saddo payutto siyā, na ca payutto, tasmā ayuttametanti. Tañca na, kasmā? Tadatthasambhavā.
atk-s0501a1:23_8: ‘‘Yo ca buddhañca dhammañca saṅghañca saraṇaṁ gato’’ti evamādīsu (dha. pa.
atk-s0501a1:23_10: na ca vijjamānatthasambhavā iti-saddā sabbattha payujjanti,
atk-s0501a1:23_11: appayuttassāpettha payuttassa viya iti-saddassa attho viññātabbo aññesu ca evaṁjātikesu, tasmā adoso eva soti. ‘‘Anujānāmi, bhikkhave,
atk-s0501a1:23_13: 34) saraṇasseva gamanīyato yaṁ vuttaṁ ‘‘gamanākāradassanatthaṁ tu saraṇavacana’’nti, taṁ na yuttamiti ce. Taṁ nāyuttaṁ. Kasmā? Tadatthasambhavā eva.
atk-s0501a1:23_15: yato pubbasadisameva appayuttopi payutto viya veditabbo.
atk-s0501a1:23_16: Itarathā hi pubbe vuttadosappasaṅgo eva siyā,
atk-s0501a1:26_1: dvayepesa nayo mato’’ti ettha vuccate – yvāyaṁ ‘‘buddhaṁ saraṇaṁ gacchāmī’’ti ettha atthavaṇṇanānayo vutto, ‘‘dhammaṁ saraṇaṁ gacchāmi,
atk-s0501a1:26_2: saṅghaṁ saraṇaṁ gacchāmī’’ti etasmimpi padadvaye esova veditabbo.
atk-s0501a1:26_3: Tatrāpi hi dhammasaṅghānaṁ atthato byañjanato ca vibhāvanamattameva asadisaṁ, sesaṁ vuttasadisameva. Yato yadevettha asadisaṁ,
atk-s0501a1:26_5: Bhāvitamaggānaṁ sacchikatanibbānānañca apāyesu apatanabhāvena dhāraṇato paramassāsavidhānato ca maggavirāgā eva imasmiṁ atthe dhammoti amhākaṁ khanti,
atk-s0501a1:26_6: aggappasādasuttañceva sādhakaṁ. Vuttañcettha ‘‘yāvatā, bhikkhave, dhammā saṅkhatā ,
atk-s0501a1:26_7: ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo tesaṁ aggamakkhāyatī’’ti evamādi (a. ni. 4.34; itivu. 90).
atk-s0501a1:27_0: Catubbidhaariyamaggasamaṅgīnaṁ catusāmaññaphalasamadhivāsitakhandhasantānānañca puggalānaṁ samūho diṭṭhisīlasaṅghātena saṁhatattā saṅgho. Vuttañcetaṁ bhagavatā –
atk-s0501a1:28_1: ye vo mayā dhammā abhiññā desitā, seyyathidaṁ, cattāro satipaṭṭhānā, cattāro sammappadhānā, cattāro iddhipādā, pañcindriyāni, pañca balāni, satta bojjhaṅgā, ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo, passasi no tvaṁ, ānanda,
atk-s0501a1:28_2: imesu dhammesu dvepi bhikkhū nānāvāde’’ti (ma. ni. 3.43).
atk-s0501a1:29_1: Sutte ca ‘‘āhuneyyo pāhuneyyo dakkhiṇeyyo añjalikaraṇīyo anuttaraṁ puññakkhettaṁ lokassā’’ti (itivu. 90; a. ni. 4.34, 181) vutto.
atk-s0501a1:29_2: Etaṁ pana saraṇaṁ gatassa aññasmimpi bhikkhusaṅghe vā bhikkhunisaṅghe vā buddhappamukhe vā saṅghe sammutisaṅghe vā catuvaggādibhede ekapuggalepi vā bhagavantaṁ uddissa pabbajite vandanādikiriyāya saraṇagamanaṁ neva bhijjati na saṁkilissati, ayamettha viseso.
atk-s0501a1:29_3: Vuttāvasesantu imassa dutiyassa ca saraṇagamanassa bhedābhedādividhānaṁ pubbe vuttanayeneva veditabbaṁ.
atk-s0501a1:31_1: kāraṇañca viniddiseti ettha etesu ca tīsu saraṇavacanesu sabbasattānaṁ aggoti katvā paṭhamaṁ buddho,
atk-s0501a1:31_3: tassa dhammassa ādhārakato tadāsevanato ca ante saṅgho.
atk-s0501a1:31_4: Sabbasattānaṁ vā hite niyojakoti katvā paṭhamaṁ buddho,
atk-s0501a1:31_6: hitādhigamāya paṭipanno adhigatahito cāti katvā ante saṅgho saraṇabhāvena vavatthapetvā pakāsitoti evaṁ anupubbavavatthāne kāraṇañca viniddise.
atk-s0501a1:33_1: tampi vuccate – ettha pana puṇṇacando viya buddho,
atk-s0501a1:33_3: puṇṇacandakiraṇasamuppāditapīṇito loko viya saṅgho. Bālasūriyo viya buddho,
atk-s0501a1:33_8: daḍḍhavanattā khettabhūto viya bhūmibhāgo daḍḍhakilesattā puññakkhettabhūto saṅgho. Mahāmegho viya buddho, salilavuṭṭhi viya dhammo,
atk-s0501a1:33_9: vuṭṭhinipātūpasamitareṇu viya janapado upasamitakilesareṇu saṅgho. Susārathi viya buddho,
atk-s0501a1:33_17: samuppāṭitapaṭalo vippasannalocano viya jano samuppāṭitamohapaṭalo vippasannañāṇalocano saṅgho.
atk-s0501a1:33_18: Sānusayakilesabyādhiharaṇasamatthatāya vā kusalo vejjo viya buddho,
atk-s0501a1:33_20: bhesajjapayogena samupasantabyādhi viya janasamudāyo samupasantakilesabyādhānusayo saṅgho.
atk-s0501a1:34_1: sumaggo viya khemantabhūmi viya ca dhammo,
atk-s0501a1:34_2: maggappaṭipanno khemantabhūmippatto viya saṅgho. Sunāviko viya buddho, nāvā viya dhammo,
atk-s0501a1:34_3: pārappatto sampattiko viya jano saṅgho. Himavā viya buddho, tappabhavosadhamiva dhammo,
atk-s0501a1:34_4: osadhūpabhogena nirāmayo viya jano saṅgho. Dhanado viya buddho, dhanaṁ viya dhammo,
atk-s0501a1:34_5: yathādhippāyaṁ laddhadhano viya jano sammāladdhaariyadhano saṅgho. Nidhidassanako viya buddho, nidhi viya dhammo, nidhippatto viya jano saṅgho.
atk-s0501a1:35_0: Apica abhayado viya vīrapuriso buddho, abhayamiva dhammo,
atk-s0501a1:35_1: sampattābhayo viya jano accantasabbabhayo saṅgho. Assāsako viya buddho, assāso viya dhammo, assatthajano viya saṅgho. Sumitto viya buddho, hitūpadeso viya dhammo,
atk-s0501a1:35_2: hitūpayogena pattasadattho viya jano saṅgho. Dhanākaro viya buddho, dhanasāro viya dhammo,
atk-s0501a1:35_6: sunhātarājakumāravaggo viya saddhammasalilasunhāto saṅgho. Alaṅkārakārako viya buddho, alaṅkāro viya dhammo,
atk-s0501a1:35_7: alaṅkatarājaputtagaṇo viya saddhammālaṅkato saṅgho. Candanarukkho viya buddho,
atk-s0501a1:35_9: candanupabhogena santapariḷāho viya jano saddhammūpabhogena santapariḷāho saṅgho.
atk-s0501a1:35_10: Dāyajjasampadānako viya pitā buddho, dāyajjaṁ viya dhammo,
atk-s0501a1:35_11: dāyajjaharo puttavaggo viya saddhammadāyajjaharo saṅgho. Vikasitapadumaṁ viya buddho, tappabhavamadhu viya dhammo,
atk-s0501a1:35_12: tadupabhogībhamaragaṇo viya saṅgho. Evaṁ saraṇattayametañca, upamāhi pakāsaye.
atk-s0501a1:36_0: Ettāvatā ca yā pubbe ‘‘kena kattha kadā kasmā,
atk-s0501a1:36_1: bhāsitaṁ saraṇattaya’’ntiādīhi catūhi gāthāhi atthavaṇṇanāya mātikā nikkhittā, sā atthato pakāsitā hotīti.
